content: @Rob Lewis do you understand why https://github.com/leanprover-community/sphere-eversion/runs/2489005601?check_suite_focus=true is failing?
Did you force push to master at some point?
It sounds like current master isn't a fast forward of the lean-3.28.0 branch
If you force push master to lean-3.28.0 it should sort itself out
Maybe I did. I'll try to force push master to lean-3.28.0
I didn't realize GitHub had this lean-3.28.0 branch
leanpkg uses it, and that CI script keeps it updated so you can (usually) ignore it
